Sentencas: Power-to-Substitute Natural Gas processes are investigated to offer solutions for renewable energy storing or transportation.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: In the present study, an original Power-to-SNG process combining high-temperature steam electrolysis and CO2 methanation is implemented and simulated.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: A reference process is firstly defined, including a specific modelling approach of the electrolysis and a methanation modelling including a kinetic law.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The process also integrates a unit to clean the gas from residual CO2, H-2 and H2(O) for gas network injection.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: Having set all the units, simulations are performed with ProsimPlus 3 (TM) software for a reference case where the electrolyser and the methanation reactors are designed.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The reference case allows to produce 67.5 Nm(3)/h of SNG with an electrical energy consumption of 14.4 kW h/Nm(3).
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The produced SNG satisfies specifications required for network injection.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: From this reference process, two sensitivity analyses on electrolysis and methanation working points and on external parameters and constraints are considered.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: As a main result, we observe that the reference case maximises both process efficiency and SNG production when compared with other studied cases.
Titulo: Parametric study of an efficient renewable power-to-substitute-natural-gas process including high-temperature steam electrolysis
